products.title: Marble, Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: The intricate texture of marble shimmer invites your eye in to take a closer look at a fabric that is certainly more than it first appears. As you survey the changes in direction of the pattern you quickly lose yourself in the moment and feel at ease. If you want to project the theme around the room then you need to think about other natural patterns you can work in. The undulating texture of slate, the rings on a log slice, and the way in which the light dances with sprung copper would all be interesting things to look at.

products.title: Capella, Golden Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun is shining you become fascinated with the myriad ways in which it dances with colours that had never shown a hint of life before. Capella golden shimmer allows you to celebrate that natural beauty all year round with its clever use of luxurious golden threads and timeless floral patterning. Take your decor further towards the luxury end of the spectrum and something magical happens. You feel like you can do anything with your decor, and become inspired to find finishing touches that will speak volumes.

products.title: Shimmer Ochre Yellow Roman Blind
products.description: How opulent would this shimmer roman blind look in your home? It doesnt matter if your place is understated or brimming with lavishness, this ochre blind will be the perfect accent. The plain style wont cloud your living room, but it will generate interest as the sunshine glints off the metallic yarn weve woven through the fabric. Product id: db-rom1119 fabric colour: ochre yellow material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.

products.title: Shimmer Gold Roman Blind
products.description: There are times when another pattern is overkill, but you still want to add a different dimension. The shimmer roman blind does just that. Weve laced it with gold metallics within a textured fabric so every element catches the light. Add this to an already busy living room as an accent, or make these blinds the focus in a simple area. Product id: db-rom1117 fabric colour: gold material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
